fulltext:
Bang Nguyen – IT Recruiter 
Location: Go Vap Dist., Ho Chi Minh City 
Mobile: +8438-610-3423 | Email: bang.nguyen2510@gmail.com 
Summary 
IT Recruiter with 4 years experiences in finding talents for start-ups and enterprises. 
Broad knowledge about IT jobs, sourcing tools and result-oriented mindset always 
challenging myself to bring success in every environment. 
Skills  
 Technical Skills: 
‒ Proficient in recruiting, hiring processes, 
policies & procedures. 
‒ Proficient in CRM/ATS (Bullhorn), job 
boards (Monster, Dice, Careerbuilder, 
Indeed) & social networks (Linkedin, 
Facebook, Google). 
‒ Advanced researching skills by Boolean, 
Google X-ray, Hiretual, Internet. 
‒ Broad knowledge about IT industry. 
‒ Proficient in Microsoft Office products 
(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), 
Office365, Skype, Smartsheet, Slack. 
 Soft skills:  
‒ Fast learner & adapt with new 
environment quickly. 
‒ Ability to work under pressure and finish in 
deadline. 
‒ Great team-work, organizational & 
collaborative skills. 
‒ Client relationship build & development. 
‒ Problem-solving & attention to detail. 
‒ Supervisor with small team management 
experience. 
‒ Advanced communication, including verbal 
and writing English skills
Professional Experience 
 IT Recruiter at Restaff – House of Norway 
August 2018 to current 
Main Responsibilities include: 
Recruitment (80%): 
‒ In charge of internal IT recruitment process on sourcing, screening, interviewing, 
negotiating, make offer & on-boarding candidates. 
‒ Communicate with team leaders to clarify position requirements, re-write job 
descriptions, keep them posted with new candidates, schedule onsite interview, 
‒ Build and maintain relationship with qualified, unqualified & potential candidates. 
‒ Manage and leverage passive candidate resources (ITviec, Topdev, Facebook, 
Linkedin, Website, Referrals program). 
‒ Research new tools for recruiting system (Base E-Hiring, Airtable). 
‒ Report to HR supervisor, General Manager about recruitment opportunities, issues 
and strategies weekly, monthly. 
‒ Hiring jobs focus on: Full-stack (ASP.Net, Java), Sharepoint, WPF, Front-end 
(AngularJS, ReactJS), Backend (NodeJS). 
Social activities (20%): 
‒ Update company site, Facebook, Linkedin, working with freelance digital marketing 
team to build social media plans. 
‒ Keep track company intranet, book library, sport clubs, English Classes, happy hours. 
‒ Support planning & preparing stuffs for company trip, Vietnamese Women Day, 
Halloween party. 
‒ Collaborate with team leaders & HR to make workshop program at University. 
 IT Recruitment Consultant at JT1 - IT Recruitment Agency 
May 2018 - August 2018 
Main Responsibilities include: 
‒ Build IT clients and deal contracts, collect various IT job vacancies e.g .Net, Java, 
PHP, ReactJS/ ReactNative, NodeJS, Business Analyst, Technical Lead, Engineering 
Manager...  
‒ Work closely with Business Development Manager to define clients demand, clarify 
Job Requirements and target profiles. 
‒ Source candidates through various channels like internal database, Linkedin, 
Facebook, VNW, Careerbuilder, Jobstreet, Job Posting, Referrals... 
‒ Conduct cold-calls, phone screens, appointments with candidates to qualify skills 
and potential for clients. 
‒ Point of contact between clients and candidates, support interview schedules, 
collect feedbacks, make offers. 
‒ Improve team-work from sharing information daily, mentor intern members. 
‒ Team meeting weekly to keep track performance, discuss plans and solutions to 
maximize working process. 
 Senior Research Analyst/ IT Sourcer at Harvey Nash Viet Nam 
May 2017 - May 2018 
More management responsibilities to help team members success and 
grow include: 
‒ Train new members and keep track the quality of members work. 
‒ Organize and balance the workload to the team. 
‒ Setup daily meeting to discuss new roles, explain main keys to the team members. 
‒ Schedule monthly meeting to summarize team performance and encourage, give 
idea for team improvement. 
‒ Make reports sending directly to Project Manager.  
‒ Work with Project Manager and other team leader to bring out best strategy to the 
team. 
 Recruitment Support / IT Sourcer at Harvey Nash Viet Nam 
Aug 2014 - May 2017 
Harvey Nash, a global professional recruitment consultancy and IT 
outsourcing service provider, is committed to delivering the very best 
talent and IT solutions to a broad base of international clients.  
My responsibilities include: 
‒ Get job descriptions (permanent, contract-to-hire, contract) from US clients through 
email, Skype and communicate with internal and external teams to clarify 
requirements. 
‒ Find qualified candidates from all US locations (mostly WA, CO, IL, NY, CA) by using 
various resources, screening resumes, input candidate data to our database and 
send to local recruiting teams in US for contacting. 
‒ Collect feedbacks from US teams to improve the search and candidate quality. 
‒ Keep track with our candidates in our database and make note for local recruiter to 
follow up. 
‒ Train new comer about working process, sourcing techniques, team policies. 
‒ Assist team leader by coordinating workload to team members, answering client 
emails, preparing weekly, monthly reports, also developing, testing and executing 
new search strategies. 
‒ Provide support for nightshift team by working directly with recruiting teams in US 
through Skype or Slack to find talents fast in order to close hot positions for our 
important clients.

Accomplishments:  
‒ List positions that I have been successful in: 
 Business Analyst / Systems Analyst  
 Project / Program / Product Manager 
 Manager / Director / CTO / VP in IT, Software development 
 SDET / QA (Manual and Automation) 
 Software developer / engineer / architect / devops (Java, C#, .Net, C++, Python, 
Ru�y, PHP, Javas�ript, Go…) 
 Mobile developer (IOS/ Android/ Windows phone) 
 Network / Systems Engineer (Windows, Linux, Mac, Cloud, Azure, AWS, 
Virtualization, Cisco, SAN, security tools…) 
 Helpdesk / IT Support / Customer Service 
‒ By being 1st Placement Maker in last quarter 2015, I was honored to represent 
HarveyNashVN team to visit HarveyNashUS Office in Seattle, Washington in June 
2016. During a week there, I was shared and learned a lot with our US partners 
about working processes, US job markets, sourcing experiences... 
 IT Support (Intern) 
University Mecical Center, Ho Chi Minh City 
Dec 2013 - Mar 2014 
Educations 
● 2005 - 2008: Go Vap High School in Ho Chi Minh City. 
● 2009 - 2010: Bachelor of Information Technology in Hoa Sen Unitersity. (not completed) 
● 2011 - 2014: NIIT training center of Hoa Sen University, Graduated in 2014 with 
Professional Diploma Degree in Information Technology, major in Network Engineering. 
Achievements from Education 
● Certificate for completed Soft skills course in Communication and presentation/ 
Organization/ Problem Solving. 
● HBright Future 2012 Scholarship in recognition of excellent performance in Semester 1 
at NIIT Center. 
● Certificate of completed Intermediate level Communication English at Vietnam USA 
Society English Training Service Centers (short by VUS). 
● TOEIC Passed Exam with 715.  
Personal Information 
● Full Name: Nguyen Anh Bang. 
● Gender: Male. 
● Date of Birth: October 25th 1990.  
● Place of Birth: Ho Chi Minh City. 
● Nationality: Viet Nam. 
● Permanent Address: 29, Trung Nu Vuong Street, Ward 4,Go Vap Dist., HCMC.
